featured.text: I said I was interested in their regional accents, and that it would take only a few minutes.
I turned on the tape-recorder and each in turn solemnly counted from one to twenty in their best accent.
He wanted to discover who had the best accent.

definition.en_def: A distinctive way of pronouncing a language, often associated with a particular region or social group.
definition.example: She has a charming French accent when she speaks English.
